attributes.action: Would voters vote for a NEW GOVERNMENT if the promised to reduce fuel duty by at least 10%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the cost of fuel has a effect on everything we buy. by reducing duty every person in the uk would be better of.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
